DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose trial evaluate safety tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics , multiple oral dos PF-04620110 modified-release formulation .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of PF-04620110 As A Modified-Release Formulation In Healthy Overweight Or Obese Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate safety tolerability , pharmacokinetics ( PK ) , pharmacodynamics , multiple oral dos PF-04620110 modified-release formulation .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 55 year , inclusive . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 27 35 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) disease clinical finding screen .
DOC.keyword: Multiple Dose Study Overweight Healthy Subjects Body Weight Modified-Release Formulation
